mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board ( TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, 0, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ) AS TOTAL_COUNT, TITLE, WRITER, HIT_CNT, (date_format(CREA_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i')) AS CREA_DTM FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY B_ID DESC LIMIT #{START}, #{END}
